Dear President or all staff members, 

I am proud that our shared commitment to slowing  and  stopping COVID-19 has saved lives across Canada & US. We have all made important sacrifices to keep our families, friends and communities safe; and we must stay focused on keeping the curve flat.

But it's time for the government to present a plan to safely and responsibly allow Canadians to travel.

Mr. President, I am worried that Canada & US is standing still while other safe countries start to reopening.

The government must act alongside safe countries in Europe that are now responsibly reopening shops, restaurants, travel and tourism, and build a made in United States and Canada plan that:

Rapidly establishes a national framework to ease interprovincial travel restrictions.

Clearly communicates to Canadians that they can travel safely by air to visit their favorite Canadian tourist destinations.

Establishes reciprocal border agreements with safe countries like those in Europe who have responsibly restarted travel.

Reopening Maryland and rebuilding america economy and build back better plan. 

With many Canadians I need to count on you and my elected officials to recognize my concerns, the need for a responsible plan to safely restart travel as soon as possible.

Road to reopening your small businesses and economy recovery, Reopen all indoor & outdoor dining, slowly getting things back to normal.

Sincerely,

Mr. Keshav Gupta
